meanings.definition: A system of organizing days for social, religious, commercial, or administrative purposes.
meanings.sent1: My mom uses calendars to plan our family activities.
meanings.sent2: I marked my friend's birthday on the calendar so I wouldn't forget.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked the calendar off the wall, causing chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her calendar was like a map guiding her through the busy week.
meanings.sent5: The colorful calendar on the fridge brightened up the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A chart or series of pages showing the days, weeks, and months of a particular year, or giving particular seasonal information.
meanings.sent1: The office calendar helps us keep track of important deadlines.
meanings.sent2: I love flipping through the calendar to see all the beautiful pictures.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the calendar for a tree and tried to climb it.
meanings.sent4: Her calendar was a treasure trove of memories from the past year.
meanings.sent5: The calendar on the wall whispered the passing of time with each page turn.
